languages.text: "Кто ты такой, чтобы перебивать меня, изгой?!" {n}Маражай впечатывает каждое слово в воздух, словно выверенный и просчитанный удар.{/n} "Ты, глава Обсидианового суда, слишком стар и дряхл, чтобы рисковать жизненными силами на просторах реального мира! И все же ты, Назракей, здесь — из-за жалкого гладиатора арены? Или, быть может, кабалита, который после твоего приговора сбежал из Темного города живым и выставил на посмешище кабал самого Асдрубаэля Векта? Тебя вышвырнули из Комморры — до тех пор, пока ты сам не исправишь свою оплошность!"

"Who are you to interrupt me, outcast?" {n}Marazhai hurls each word into the air like a well-calculated blow.{/n} "You, head of the Obsidian Court, are too old and decrepit to risk wasting your life force out in realspace! And yet you are here, Nazrakhei, because of a lowly gladiator from the arena? Or perhaps because of a Kabalite who escaped the Dark City with his life in spite of your sentence, and who thus made a mockery of Asdrubael Vect's Kabal? You have been cast out of Commorragh until you correct your blunder!"
languages.original_text: "Кто ты такой, чтобы перебивать меня, изгой?!" {n}Маражай впечатывает каждое слово в воздух, словно выверенный и просчитанный удар.{/n} "Ты, глава Обсидианового суда, слишком стар и дряхл, чтобы рисковать жизненными силами на просторах реального мира! И все же ты, Назракей, здесь — из-за жалкого гладиатора арены? Или, быть может, кабалита, который после твоего приговора сбежал из Темного города живым и выставил на посмешище кабал самого Асдрубаэля Векта? Тебя вышвырнули из Комморры — до тех пор, пока ты сам не исправишь свою оплошность!"

traits.locale_text: "Who are you to interrupt me, outcast?!" {n}Marazhai hurls each word into the air like a well-calculated blow.{/n} "You, head of the Obsidian Court, are too old and decrepit to risk wasting life force out in the realspace! And yet you are here, Nazrakhei, because of a lowly gladiator from the arena? Or perhaps because of a Kabalite who escaped the Dark City with his life after you pronounced his sentence and thus made a mockery of Asdrubael Vect's Kabal? You have been cast out of Commorragh until you correct your blunder!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Who are you to interrupt me, outcast?" {n}Marazhai hurls each word into the air like a well-calculated blow.{/n} "You, head of the Obsidian Court, are too old and decrepit to risk wasting your life force out in realspace! And yet you are here, Nazrakhei, because of a lowly gladiator from the arena? Or perhaps because of a Kabalite who escaped the Dark City with his life in spite of your sentence, and who thus made a mockery of Asdrubael Vect's Kabal? You have been cast out of Commorragh until you correct your blunder!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Wer seid Ihr, mich zu unterbrechen, Ausgestoßener?" {n}Marazhai schleudert jedes Wort in die Luft wie einen gut berechneten Hieb.{/n} "Ihr, Leiter des Obsidiangerichts, seid zu alt und gebrechlich, um Eure Lebenskraft im Realraum zu riskieren! Und doch seid Ihr hier, Nazrakhei, wegen eines niederen Gladiatoren aus der Arena? Oder vielleicht wegen eines Kabalisten, der trotz Eures Urteils lebend aus der Dunklen Stadt entkommen ist und Asdrubael Vects Kabale dadurch zum Gespött gemacht hat? Ihr wurdet aus Commorragh verbannt, bis Ihr Euren Fehler korrigiert!"
languages.original_text: "Who are you to interrupt me, outcast?" {n}Marazhai hurls each word into the air like a well-calculated blow.{/n} "You, head of the Obsidian Court, are too old and decrepit to risk wasting your life force out in realspace! And yet you are here, Nazrakhei, because of a lowly gladiator from the arena? Or perhaps because of a Kabalite who escaped the Dark City with his life in spite of your sentence, and who thus made a mockery of Asdrubael Vect's Kabal? You have been cast out of Commorragh until you correct your blunder!"

traits.locale_text: "Wer seid Ihr, mich zu unterbrechen, Ausgestoßener?" {n}Marazhai schleudert jedes Wort in die Luft wie einen gut berechneten Hieb.{/n} "Ihr, Leiter des Obsidiangerichts, seid zu alt und gebrechlich, um Eure Lebenskraft im Realraum zu riskieren! Und doch seid Ihr hier, Nazrakhei, wegen eines niederen Gladiatoren aus der Arena? Oder vielleicht wegen eines Kabalisten, der trotz Eures Urteils lebend aus der Dunklen Stadt entkommen ist und Asdrubael Vects Kabale dadurch zum Gespött gemacht hat? Ihr wurdet aus Commorragh verbannt, bis Ihr Euren Fehler korrigiert!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “你是什么东西，竟敢打断我的话，你这个流放者？”{n}玛拉斋一字一顿地呵斥道，就像是在发动精心策划的打击。{/n}“你，黑曜王庭的领袖，年老体衰，根本不敢冒险在真实世界里浪费你的生命力！可你现在却出现在这里，纳札骸，仅仅是为了竞技场里某个卑微的角斗士吗？还是因为，阴谋团的成员无视你的判决，逃出了黑暗之城，让阿斯德鲁拜尔·维克特的阴谋团颜面扫地？你已经被赶出了科摩罗！除非你纠正这个错误，否则你就回不去了！”
languages.original_text: "Who are you to interrupt me, outcast?" {n}Marazhai hurls each word into the air like a well-calculated blow.{/n} "You, head of the Obsidian Court, are too old and decrepit to risk wasting your life force out in realspace! And yet you are here, Nazrakhei, because of a lowly gladiator from the arena? Or perhaps because of a Kabalite who escaped the Dark City with his life in spite of your sentence, and who thus made a mockery of Asdrubael Vect's Kabal? You have been cast out of Commorragh until you correct your blunder!"

traits.locale_text: “你是什么东西，竟敢打断我的话，你这个流放者？”{n}玛拉斋一字一顿地呵斥道，就像是在发动精心策划的打击。{/n}“你，黑曜王庭的领袖，年老体衰，根本不敢冒险在真实世界里浪费你的生命力！可你现在却出现在这里，纳札骸，仅仅是为了竞技场里某个卑微的角斗士吗？还是因为，阴谋团的成员无视你的判决，逃出了黑暗之城，让阿斯德鲁拜尔·维克特的阴谋团颜面扫地？你已经被赶出了科摩罗！除非你纠正这个错误，否则你就回不去了！”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Et qui êtes-vous donc pour m'interrompre ainsi, paria ? » {n}Marazhai martèle chaque syllabe comme autant de puissants coups de poing.{/n} « Vous, chef de la Cour d'Obsidienne, êtes trop vieux et décrépi pour risquer votre force vitale dans l'espace réel ! Et pourtant, Nazrakhei, vous êtes là à cause de quelque pitoyable gladiateur de l'arène ? Ou peut-être à cause d'un Kabalite qui s'est dérobé à la Cité Crépusculaire malgré votre condamnation, humiliant ainsi la Kabale d'Asdrubael Vect ? Vous êtes banni de Commorragh jusqu'à ce que vous corrigiez votre erreur ! »
languages.original_text: "Who are you to interrupt me, outcast?" {n}Marazhai hurls each word into the air like a well-calculated blow.{/n} "You, head of the Obsidian Court, are too old and decrepit to risk wasting your life force out in realspace! And yet you are here, Nazrakhei, because of a lowly gladiator from the arena? Or perhaps because of a Kabalite who escaped the Dark City with his life in spite of your sentence, and who thus made a mockery of Asdrubael Vect's Kabal? You have been cast out of Commorragh until you correct your blunder!"

traits.locale_text: « Et qui êtes-vous donc pour m'interrompre ainsi, paria ? » {n}Marazhai martèle chaque syllabe comme autant de puissants coups de poing.{/n} « Vous, chef de la Cour d'Obsidienne, êtes trop vieux et décrépi pour risquer votre force vitale dans l'espace réel ! Et pourtant, Nazrakhei, vous êtes là à cause de quelque pitoyable gladiateur de l'arène ? Ou peut-être à cause d'un Kabalite qui s'est dérobé à la Cité Crépusculaire malgré votre condamnation, humiliant ainsi la Kabale d'Asdrubael Vect ? Vous êtes banni de Commorragh jusqu'à ce que vous corrigiez votre erreur ! »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿Quién eres tú para interrumpirme, proscrito?». {n}Marazhai lanza cada palabra como si fuera un dardo, calculado para maximizar el daño.{/n} «¡El jefe del Tribunal de obsidiana es demasiado viejo para arriesgar su fuerza vital en el espacio real! Y sin embargo, aquí estás, Nazrakhei. ¿Es por un mísero gladiador de la arena? ¿O es porque un Kabalista ha escapado vivo de la Ciudad Siniestra a pesar de tu sentencia, poniendo en evidencia a la Kábala de Asdrubael Vect? ¡Te han expulsado de Commorragh hasta que corrigas tu vergonzoso fracaso!».
languages.original_text: "Who are you to interrupt me, outcast?" {n}Marazhai hurls each word into the air like a well-calculated blow.{/n} "You, head of the Obsidian Court, are too old and decrepit to risk wasting your life force out in realspace! And yet you are here, Nazrakhei, because of a lowly gladiator from the arena? Or perhaps because of a Kabalite who escaped the Dark City with his life in spite of your sentence, and who thus made a mockery of Asdrubael Vect's Kabal? You have been cast out of Commorragh until you correct your blunder!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Quién eres tú para interrumpirme, proscrito?». {n}Marazhai lanza cada palabra como si fuera un dardo, calculado para maximizar el daño.{/n} «¡El jefe del Tribunal de obsidiana es demasiado viejo para arriesgar su fuerza vital en el espacio real! Y sin embargo, aquí estás, Nazrakhei. ¿Es por un mísero gladiador de la arena? ¿O es porque un Kabalista ha escapado vivo de la Ciudad Siniestra a pesar de tu sentencia, poniendo en evidencia a la Kábala de Asdrubael Vect? ¡Te han expulsado de Commorragh hasta que corrigas tu vergonzoso fracaso!».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「俺を邪魔するお前は誰だ、追放者よ？」{n}マラズハイは計算された打撃のように一言ずつ力強く言葉を吐き出す。{/n}「オブシディア法廷の議長よ、リアルスペースで生命力を消費するリスクを冒すにはお前は年を取ってよぼよぼすぎる！しかしお前がここにいるのは、ナズラクヘイ、アリーナの卑しいグラディエーターのせいか？もしくはお前の判決にもかかわらず仄暗き都から逃げ出し、それゆえアスドルバエル・ヴェクトの陰謀団を嘲笑うカバライトのせいか？お前は自身の誤りを正すまでコモラフから追放されたままなんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Who are you to interrupt me, outcast?" {n}Marazhai hurls each word into the air like a well-calculated blow.{/n} "You, head of the Obsidian Court, are too old and decrepit to risk wasting your life force out in realspace! And yet you are here, Nazrakhei, because of a lowly gladiator from the arena? Or perhaps because of a Kabalite who escaped the Dark City with his life in spite of your sentence, and who thus made a mockery of Asdrubael Vect's Kabal? You have been cast out of Commorragh until you correct your blunder!"

traits.locale_text: 「俺を邪魔するお前は誰だ、追放者よ？」{n}マラズハイは計算された打撃のように一言ずつ力強く言葉を吐き出す。{/n}「オブシディア法廷の議長よ、リアルスペースで生命力を消費するリスクを冒すにはお前は年を取ってよぼよぼすぎる！しかしお前がここにいるのは、ナズラクヘイ、アリーナの卑しいグラディエーターのせいか？もしくはお前の判決にもかかわらず仄暗き都から逃げ出し、それゆえアスドルバエル・ヴェクトの陰謀団を嘲笑うカバライトのせいか？お前は自身の誤りを正すまでコモラフから追放されたままなんだ！」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Sen kim oluyorsun da benim lafımı bölüyorsun yurtsuz?" {n}Marazhai; her bir kelimeyi, iyi hesaplanmış birer darbe gibi savuruyor.{/n} "Sen ki Obsidiyen Divan'ın başısın, yaşam gücünü gerçekuzayda riske atamayacak kadar yaşlı ve dermansızsın! Peki neden buradasın Nazrakhei?.. Arenadaki aşağılık bir gladyatör yüzünden mi? Yoksa cezasını vermiş olmana rağmen Kara Şehir'den kaçan bir Kabalist, Asdrubael Vect'in Kabalı'nı alay konusu ettiğinden mi? Bu haltı telafi edinceye dek Commorragh'tan sürülmüşsün!"
languages.original_text: "Who are you to interrupt me, outcast?" {n}Marazhai hurls each word into the air like a well-calculated blow.{/n} "You, head of the Obsidian Court, are too old and decrepit to risk wasting your life force out in realspace! And yet you are here, Nazrakhei, because of a lowly gladiator from the arena? Or perhaps because of a Kabalite who escaped the Dark City with his life in spite of your sentence, and who thus made a mockery of Asdrubael Vect's Kabal? You have been cast out of Commorragh until you correct your blunder!"

traits.locale_text: "Sen kim oluyorsun da benim lafımı bölüyorsun yurtsuz?" {n}Marazhai her bir kelimeyi, iyi hesaplanmış birer darbe gibi savuruyor.{/n} "Sen, Obsidiyen Divan'ın başı, yaşam gücünü gerçekuzayda riske atamayacak kadar yaşlı ve dermansızsın! Yine de buradasın Nazrakhei. Arenadaki ezik bir gladyatör yüzünden mi? Yoksa cezasını vermiş olmana rağmen Kara Şehir'den kaçmış bir Kabalist, Asdrubael Vect'in Kabal'ını alay konusu yaptığı için mi? Falsonu telafi edene kadar Commorragh'tan sürülmüşsün!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
